narrative:
This is a 1st Prelicense Inspection for a Class B license.  The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The licensing fee must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager. 
 
End Section
